other_tests.findings: Patients given lithium were ill for significantly fewer weeks than those given placebo.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Mr.A continued to take 300mg of lithium carbonate b.i.d., and his blood lithium level remains in the therapeutic range (around 1.0 mEq/liter). Ms.B responded well to the medication and was discharged with adequate functioning; Ms.C showed gradual improvement after being placed on 50mg of fluphenazine decanoate I.M. and 300mg of lithium carbonate t.i.d.

other_tests.findings: Mr.A exhibited an IQ of 47 (mentally defective range); Ms.B had an IQ of 76 (borderline mental retardation); Ms.C had an IQ of 61 (mentally defective).
